snippet: CARAJOHN--Christopher Z.,passed away Monday evening. A loving husband, father, brother, uncle, and friend, Christopher is survived by his wife Lauren, his children Michael, Nicholas, and Alexander, and his sister Mary. The funeral service will be held on Friday at St. Constantine and Helen Greek Orthodox Church in Brooklyn at 11am. The family will be greeting friends and relatives following the funeral services, from 4pm-9pm at 136 East 64th Street. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CARAJOHN, CHRISTOPHER Z.
